General.Name: Nala Digital Commerce Ltd
General.Description: Nala Digital Commerce Ltd operates physical and online pop-up site. The company was formerly known as Shefa Yamim Ltd and changed its name to Nala Digital Commerce Ltd on October 28, 2020. Nala Digital Commerce Ltd was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.
General.Address: 144 Menachem Begin Road, Tel Aviv, Israel, 42106

1.Name: Mr. Diel  Shoshi
1.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Spotgo Ltd
